Detailed Description

The MP3 player implementation class. Use the base class or the methods of AudioDeviceManager, the AudioReference, or the AudioActiveReference.

BOOLEAN MP3AudioPlayer::FastForward (  AudioActiveReference &  active_reference,
UINT32  frame
) 
 

Scans forward through the current playback

Parameters:
active_reference. The playing reference to be scanned
frame. Number of frames to be moved forward
Returns:
TRUE if the scan can be done.
Note:
If frame is out of range the value will be ignored.

BOOLEAN MP3AudioPlayer::FastReverse (  AudioActiveReference &  active_reference,
UINT32  frame
) 
 

Scans backward through the current playback

Parameters:
active_reference. The playing reference to be scanned
frame. Number of frames to be moved backward
Returns:
TRUE if the scan can be done.
Note:
If the frame is out of range the value will be ignored. See GetNumberOfFrames() and GetCurrentFrame() functions

BOOLEAN MP3AudioPlayer::GetCurrentFrame (  AudioActiveReference &  playing_reference  ) 
 

(Not yet implemented) Get the current frame position. The application will receive the AudioMP3CurrentFrameMsg APOXI message containing the current frame position.

Parameters:
playing_reference. The playing reference to get the current frame
Returns:
TRUE if no errors
